talk005:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>It's covered in lost fog up ahead, so only
Koroks can go there...

<sp:3:0:2:0c01>You can see an island floating in the sky
from there.<sp:5:0:0> I wonder if you could see into
the forest <clr:0000>from that sky island<clr:ffff> too...
talk007:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>You can see an island floating in the sky
from there. I wonder if you could see into
the forest <clr:0000>from that sky island<clr:ffff> too...
talk001:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>It's been a while, so maybe I should go
see how it's going over there.
talk008:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>Huh?!<sp:5:0:0> You're not even a Korok, and you
still got there?! Woooooow!

<sp:3:0:2:0000>Isn't it great? It's my secret, even from
the other Koroks. Don't tell!

I'm gonna go check on it since I haven't
visited in a while. See you!
near001: I'll go see how it's doing...
talk002:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Up ahead, there's a special place just
for Maca!

<sp:3:0:2:0701>In the forest, there's a wide, open space,
and right in the middle, there's a
<clr:0000>green swirl<clr:ffff>.
<sp:3:0:2:0801>And! You <clr:0000>can see an island floating in the
sky<clr:ffff> from there! <sp:5:0:0>Maca loves that place.
talk004:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Oh, but since it's covered in lost fog,
only Koroks can go there.

<sp:3:0:2:0a00>So you can't come with me. But...<sp:5:1:0>


<sp:3:0:2:0700>I'll tell you where to find it.<sp:5:1:0> Could you
show me your <clr:0000>map<clr:ffff>?
